channel.title: Need help on multiple things!14questions
channel.description:
im working on a new server(edited form Project Xile V1.8) and i have some problems if u know ne of the awnsers put the # of the question and the awnser plz ty
1. how do i get my server to run from my no-ip connection instead of 0.0.0.0?
2. is there ne way to make it so u have to be a certain lvl in a skill to go into a shop (or to buy an item from the shop)? if so how?
3.FIXED how do i fix this-when i use an anchovie on the range i get a cooked anchovie but teh raw is still there and can b used again?
4. whenever i try going to teh bank it says lost connection then it loads again and is fine (i can still go through the emote tab bank)
5.can i make the white apron and chefs hat like the cooking guantlets (burn stuff less)?if so how?
6. i cant eat giant cod only cook teh raw 1's
7. FIXEDthe lava eel lives in lava but can b cooked:p is there ne way that to make it so that u use raw lava eel with a bucket of water to cook it :p
8. is there a way to make a shop so u can put an item up for "auction" for a certain price and log out and come back l8r to c if ne1 boutgh it then collect the $$
9.is tehre a way i can make the red dragon mask so it has teh stats of the current dragon full mask and tehn rename it to "dragon full mask"
10.some things cant be cooked can i fix that?
11. is there a way to change prayers so tehy give u like 5% more in fishing???(would be useful)
12.can i make it so if u examine the bank notice board it show to commands? if so how?
13. is it possible to make it so if u examine 5 things in the right order it gives u items?? if so how?
14. how to i make it so u have to be a certain cb lvl to go through a portal?
thanks for the help[br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2007, 06:27:06 PM[/size][hr]ne1???

item.title: Need help on multiple things!14questions
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

  1. how do i get my server to run from my no-ip connection instead of 0.0.0.0?

First of all, go to No-IP. Make an account a nd create a No-IP URL. Now look at the Downloads, and get the DUC. Download it and install, then leave it be. Open your router (Put the IP in your URL. If you don’t know it try 192.168.1.1). Find the gaming tab, or virtual servers, or somethig similar. You’ll have a place to put the name, the FTP (I think), and theres alot of other stuff. Put in the port, the name, use both for FTP, and enable it. Save your settings. Now restart DUC and press the smiley next to the URL

  1. is there ne way to make it so u have to be a certain lvl in a skill to go into a shop (or to buy an item from the shop)? if so how?

Make it very out of the way, and then add this command-
else if(command.startsWith(“shopname”)&&playerLevel[level ID here] = XP for the level you want)
teleto = coords1;
teleto = coords1;
}

Off the top of my head, fix what needs it.

  1. whenever i try going to teh bank it says lost connection then it loads again and is fine (i can still go through the emote tab bank)

Search openBank and see if it says disconnect, delete it. If it persists tell me, or if there isn’t something about disconnect

5.can i make the white apron and chefs hat like the cooking guantlets (burn stuff less)?if so how?

Yes. Someone else will have to show you because I don’t really see how hard it is :\

  1. i cant eat giant cod only cook teh raw 1’s

  2. is there a way to make a shop so u can put an item up for “auction” for a certain price and log out and come back l8r to c if ne1 boutgh it then collect the $$

Write click - Trade
And you even get the money instantly.
lol no I like this idea, I’ll code it for my server and give it to you as well.

9.is tehre a way i can make the red dragon mask so it has teh stats of the current dragon full mask and tehn rename it to “dragon full mask”
Well, it’s in Item2.java or Item3.java (I think). Search the mask ID and change the stats.
Changing the name is clientside, if you want to make a client for it it’ll be alot harder (Not really but just more shit…)

10.some things cant be cooked can i fix that? Open item java, look at like, food or something and add the ID there

  1. is there a way to change prayers so tehy give u like 5% more in fishing???(would be useful)
    Ya, make the void and search the prayer command you want, then change out the code and replace it with the void name.

12.can i make it so if u examine the bank notice board it show to commands? if so how?
Put an invisible large object over it, create a case for it. No one will know if done correctly.

  1. is it possible to make it so if u examine 5 things in the right order it gives u items?? if so how?
    It will involve voids, ints, and booleans, and probably cases. Learn them without asking too much, you’ll get it more.

  2. how to i make it so u have to be a certain cb lvl to go through a portal?
    Same way I showed you how to teleport, but in a case and not a command.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on multiple things!14questions
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

Ok I don’t know how many noob questions there are, so i’ll answer number 3.
Find in your client.java the anchovie is used the the range(if you can’t find it, stop working on your server NOW)
It should say something like:
addItem(Anchovie, 1);
Add above that
deleteItem(Anchovie, getItemSlot(anchovie), 1);
Make sure you use raw ID’s ^

Number 7
Add a useItemID == lavaeel && useWith == bucketOfWater
That’s a simple one

Read full topic
